name: Sunrise's Order
description:
You're so addicted to the brand new farm game that's just been released that you decide to go on an adventure, just like the hero of your favorite video game. After buying an island to build your farm, you're ready to live a new life and face all the challenges that will come your way to make a living from your crops.



As the only inhabitant of your island, you'll have to use a delivery service to better equip yourself. Fortunately, there is Animazon. With Animazon, you can purchase everything you need to succeed in your quest to become a successful small farmer.


As you level up your farm, you unlock skill points that help you get different bonuses that will be useful throughout your adventure. You can increase the length of the day, have more space in your inventory and improve the quality of your crops.



By completing orders through the contract system, you can earn rewards such as money and reputation points. These reputation points allow you to learn new constructions for your farm.



The weather is unpredictable. Even if it can work in your favor, it can also sometimes be constraining.



You can expand your space on the island by clearing new parcels. Several types of plots are available such as field, garden, animal husbandry and many others.


Fishing
With your fishing rod in hand, you can catch fish while playing a rhythmic mini-game.

The pond
If you add fish to your pond and are patient, you can make an exceptional discovery.

The kitchen
Prepare delicious meals in your kitchen and enjoy them to earn energy points.

Animazon subscription
Animazon offers various subscriptions that can make your life easier, the most popular of which is Animazon Express.
